Hello, world!

name: Vue.js
description: The Progressive JavaScript Framework.
example_code: var app = new Vue({ el: '#app', data: { message: 'Hello Vue!' } });

name: Angular
description: A platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

name: Next.js
description: The React Framework for Production.
example_code:
export default function Home() { return

Hello Next.js

; }

name: Svelte
description: Cybernetically enhanced web apps.
example_code: Hello {name}!

name: Express
description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js.
example_code: const app = require('express')(); app.get('/', (req, res) => res.send('Hello World!'));

name: Django
description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.
example_code: def index(request): return HttpResponse('Hello, world!')

name: Flask
description: A lightweight WSGI web application framework for Python.
example_code: from flask import Flask; app = Flask(__name__); @app.route('/') def hello(): return 'Hello, World!'

name: Ruby on Rails
description: Server-side web application framework written in Ruby.
example_code: class WelcomeController < ApplicationController def index render plain: 'Hello, world!' end end

name: Spring Boot
description: Spring Boot makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring-based Applications.
example_code: @SpringBootApplication public class Application { public static void main(String[] args) { SpringApplication.run(Application.class, args); } }

name: Laravel
description: A PHP framework for web artisans.
example_code: Route::get('/', function () { return view('welcome'); });

name: ASP.NET Core
description: A cross-platform, high-performance framework for building modern, cloud-based web apps.
example_code: app.MapGet("/", () => "Hello World!");

name: Nuxt.js
description: The Intuitive Vue Framework.

name: Fastify
description: Fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js.
example_code: const fastify = require('fastify')(); fastify.get('/', async (request, reply) => { return { hello: 'world' } });

name: NestJS
description: A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable server-side applications.
example_code: @Controller() export class AppController { @Get() getHello(): string { return this.appService.getHello(); } }

name: Symfony
description: A set of reusable PHP components and a PHP framework for web projects.
example_code: use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response; return new Response('Hello, world!');

name: Gatsby
description: Blazing fast modern site generator for React.
example_code:
export default function Home() { return
Hello Gatsby!
; }

name: Meteor
description: An ultra-simple, database-everywhere, data-on-the-wire, pure-Javascript web framework.
example_code: if (Meteor.isClient) { Template.hello.greeting = function () { return 'Hello, world!'; } }

name: Phoenix
description: A productive web framework that does not compromise speed or maintainability.
example_code: defmodule MyAppWeb.PageController do use MyAppWeb, :controller def index(conn, _params) do text(conn, "Hello, World!") end end

name: Koa
description: Next generation web framework for Node.js.
example_code: const Koa = require('koa'); const app = new Koa(); app.use(ctx => { ctx.body = 'Hello World'; });

name: Strapi
description: The leading open-source headless CMS.
example_code: module.exports = { 'index': async ctx => { ctx.send('Hello World!'); } };
